articles.description: Sony has launched the new WH-CH720N Noise-Cancelling headphones with up to 50 hours of battery life in India. Check out the details here.
articles.content: Sony has launched a new pair of budget headphones called the WH-CH720N in India. The headphones come with noise-canceling capabilities, up to 50 hours of battery life, and much more. Have a look at a… [+1814 chars]
